title: Digital Twin NFT for Farm products
description: It becomes harder for small farmers to support a high demand of fresh, local food with industrial standards and keep sustainability.
solution: Our solution is to help farmers to make standards NFT of their products  in order to be more valuable for consumers, industrial and services
experience: Engineer msc, emurgo blockchain student,  startup for sustainability in farmers collective https://solarimpulse.com/companies/drive-durable
